for t in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    n=int(raw_input())
    d={}
    l=map(int,raw_input().split())
    for element in l:
        if element in d:
            d[element]+=1       
        else:
            d[element]=1
    minval=l[0] 
    maxCount=0       
    for x,y in d.iteritems():
        if y>maxCount:
            maxCount=y
            minval=x        
        elif y==maxCount:
            if minval>x:
                minval=x           
    print minval,maxCount
